name: Pure Indian Cooking
description: Indian food is something you’ll frequently find in London and the rest of England and this place is definitely a must when you’re craving some. Pure Indian Cooking prides itself in being a family run restaurant with impeccable credentials.

name: Soho Tour (Available in Spanish)
description:
The free Soho tour runs through the streets of this picturesque neighborhood knowing the stories and characters that have been forging its essence. From Soho Square to China Town, and from Piccadilly Circus to Carnaby Street, a tour is framed by which we will visit the Red Light Redoubts, the bars with history of the area, talk about attacks, diseases, homosexuality and see how well-known characters like Carl Marx, Oscar Wilde or Jimi Hendrix left their mark here. It is the cradle for bohemian artists, intellectuals and writers from around the world. Come on our guruwalk and you'll never see Soho again with the same eyes.

Free tour: Book for free and pay what you want at the end

name: Jet Boating the Thames in Central London
description:
Ride the fastest speed boats on the River Thames and see London like never before in this Ultimate roller coaster on water Experience. 

Feel like James Bond for the day as you Experience an extreme sightseeing RIB ride on-board the fastest London speedboats on the River Thames. See more of London in 50 minutes (approx.) than you’d expect to see in conventional sightseeing tours three times this length.

Full fun thrilling guided commentary, turbo blasting speed and Bond music included in this Thames RIB Experience Ultimate Rollercoaster on water.

Enjoy one of the most popular Thames RIB Experiences with this 50 minute round trips from Embankment Pier in Central London. This thrilling Experience is jam packed with a fun & gripping live commentary as we pass by London’s greatest new & historical sights and has enough hair raising high speed to tip your heart rate off the scale. 

Start snapping, as we pass by Big Ben, the Houses of Parliament, MI5, MI6, The London Eye, St Paul's Cathedral, Shakespeare's Globe Theatre, Monument, the Shard, HMS Belfast, Tower Bridge and the Tower of London.

You’ll return to Embankment Pier totally buzzing in the aftermath of the most exciting 50 minutes of your life!
